title: There is no Portrait mode for my Google Camera app (v6.2.031.259661660)
content:
I have no Portrait mode available on my Google Phone app.
I have the following options: Lens Blur, Panorama, Camera, Video, More (which has Night Sight, Photo Sphere, Slow Motion, Time Lapse, Playground, Lens and Settings.)
I've seen screen shots that show "Portrait" between Panorama and Phone.
Why don't I have this mode and/or how can I add it?
